Posts.EditableText:
Embarrassed I have to ask this question.  I guess it has been a while since I've done some work on X3...

Anyway, I have a room currently titled 'village outskirts'.  I have tried ticking the prefix box, unticking it, changing the name of the room... When you enter the room or 'l', I get this:  You are in a village outskirts or you are in the village outskirts (if I change the prefix to the).

How can I get rid of 'in' and replace it with 'at' for this one room?  I want it to read 'You are at the village outskirts.'

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Unticking the prefix box has always worked for me.
